question: Who has become the new Brand Ambassador for "Swachh Bharat Mission"?
explanation: The Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty has become the new Brand Ambassador for \"Swachh Bharat Mission\". She will feature in TV and radio campaigns aimed at discouraging people from littering on roads. Shetty is the latest entrant in the list of the mission\'s ambassadors like Amitabh Bachchan, Salman Khan, Shankar Mahadevan and Sachin Tendulkar.
